Articles.Content:
I resumed developing this mod, currently I have some other, a bit more important projects to work on, but as far as I can I will rework my published and unpublished stuff. Await some new things in the next weeks...

I will provide a download link for an old version of launchers pack in the next days.
@Kartoffelkuchen you have more mods ? If so can you add a Signature to your names to other mods you done that show when you post like NathanKell done.

Good idea MeCripp!

This engine

will replace the old Merlin Engine

from the Falcon 1 Launch Vehicle. The textures of the new engine are just placeholders, they will be adapted and will give the engine a more "used" look. I`m also thinking of adding the reflection plugin to the rockets, to give them a more realistic look.

I will start with remaking the Falcon 1, afterwards I will continue with Delta II.
Images are just cut-off from Unity, maybe some quality is lost. Ingame textures have 4096x4096 resolution.
Nice! A big improvement

### Falcon 1 Update ###

I have finished the most parts of the Falcon 1 Launch Vehicel, I will probably add some small details to the 2nd Stage and to the Fairings, but the most stuff is done.

Falcon 1 comes with emessive textures for the engines, 4096 Pixel resolution and (hopefully, if I will get it working) its own FX (Flames, smoke and such)

Hope you will give me some Feedback on this...
Aand the new version is there!

Yep Downloand link

Unauthorized

The server could not verify that you are authorized to access the URL requested. You either supplied the wrong credentials (e.g. a bad password), or your browser doesn't understand how to supply the credentials required.
Updated the download, it is working now.
This brings back memories, a Kerbx falcon 1 was the launch vehicle for my first successful sattelite.
Which rocket should I make next? You can post any suggestions, if you have an idea (But please nothing which is made several times already, like Saturn V).

Thor-Delta?

Jupiter?
I love this old Version of the Atlas http://www.spacemodels.dk/Atlas/IMG_2377.JPG

Good suggestions, I will keep them in mind... But first, I want to make another rocket...can you see which rocket?

Texturing it will take some time, because I have to finish the Falcon 9 for the German Space Alliance Mod first...

It's a Delta III, isn't it? If you're making deltas, I compiled a neat list of how you can make the entire family (since the very earliest ones) with relatively little effort, because of part commonality.
Thor-Deltas would be awesome in addition, yeah.

The Kerbal Stuff download isn't working. The mod page is still there but the download fails and says the mod can't be found or was deleted.

Does anyone have a working link or a backup of the most recent version?

The Kerbal Stuff download isn't working. The mod page is still there but the download fails and says the mod can't be found or was deleted.

Does anyone have a working link or a backup of the most recent version?

Oh I'm sorry, I uploaded my mod somehow two times, and I deleted the second file yesterday, and somehow this influenced the other version...weird:huh: Anyway, I just updated the Download, now everything should be fine!

It's a Delta III, isn't it? If you're making deltas, I compiled a neat list of how you can make the entire family (since the very earliest ones) with relatively little effort, because of part commonality.

Yes, exactly, it is a Delta III. Do I understand this right, you have a list of parts for the whole Delta family, which makes it easier to recreate it? If yes, it would be great if you could send it to me, this would be nice.

Thor-Deltas would be awesome in addition, yeah.

So, then I will make the "new" Delta`s (Delta III, Delta II and Delta IV) and the Thor-Delta's. This will be a big amount of work, but it will be quiete amusing too...I guess.

Edited September 29, 2014 by Kartoffelkuchen

Does anyone know or has images of the things which are inside the red box?

Because I haven't found any images yet where you can see what that is...:|

Ps.: And sorry for double-post, I don't know how to edit a post and set it to new...:/

Edited September 30, 2014 by Kartoffelkuchen
They are flags/logos of the various countries and companies involved in the LV and satellite construction and the launch.

Almost finished with Delta III!

I hope you will like it...
Your Delta looks very nice, keep it up!

Hello, it's me again! I just want to give you some information what exactly I am doing at the moment and during the past days & weeks. So, I've been working on Delta IV, the modelling is finished now, at least for the Delta IV Medium parts, I will have to make some other parts to make the full Delta IV family, but once I have done Delta IV Medium, I just have to do DCSS 5m, A nosecone for Common Booster Core, and GEM-60 SRM's. So, here's my Delta IV model:

Splitted:

And as full rocket:

A giant thanks goes to Dragon01, who helped me a lot on developing this rocket, and supported me with many, many information! Thanks!

And by the way: Thanks for over 270 Downloads!
Which rockets of Delta family will be available in this mod? Will there be Delta-II and different variants of Delta-IV?

Which rockets of Delta family will be available in this mod? Will there be Delta-II and different variants of Delta-IV?

There will be all Delta family rockets, and each rocket has, as far as it had it in real world, the different variations. So, for Delta IV that means I'll make Delta IV Medium, Delta IV Medium (4, 2), Delta IV Medium + (5, 2 &5, 4) and Delta IV Heavy. Luckily I just have to make GEM-60 SRM's, A 5m DCSS (Second Stage) and a Nosecone, once I have Delta IV Medium done. ^^
